conversation.text: I would recommend checking out "Rockshow" if you enjoyed Jumper and Maiden in Manhattan. "Rockshow" is a concert film that captures the live performance of three iconic bands - Queen, Led Zeppelin, and The Rolling Stones - at three sold-out concerts held simultaneously in London, Los Angeles, and New York City. The film features incredible visuals, including aerial shots of the city skyline, and footage from each band's iconic performances. The film also includes behind-the-scenes footage, interviews with the bands and their members, and additional special features that provide a unique and comprehensive look at three of the most iconic bands in rock history.
